bill.summary: Expresses gratitude to Israeli law enforcement for its assistance in training and advising U.S. law enforcement officers in counterterrorism measures. Encourages continued cooperation between Israeli and U.S. law enforcement officers to enhance counterterrorism law enforcement in the United States. Recognizes the common challenges that terrorism presents to law enforcement in the United States, Israel, and other democracies.
